abstract: Cytogenetic analysis of 10 primary and 18 metastatic malignant melanomas revealed that structural abnormalities of chromosome 11 were present in 50% of metastatic lesions and were not found in primary tumors. Our findings suggest that chromosome 11 aberrations represent secondary changes in malignant melanoma tumorigenesis.
title: Absence of structural rearrangements of chromosome 11 in human primary malignant melanoma.
